action_result: The action to scroll up has been performed on the current screen. This action helps in navigating through the different pages of the shopping cart, allowing you to view and empty it if needed. Additionally, scrolling up might bring the search bar into view, enabling you to search for "razer thresher" again if you need to start the process anew or if you want to check the search results for the product.
